<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>&nbsp; <A name="page_1"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="petrobras
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P align=center>
<IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg src="x16081123203400.jpg"
width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="petrobras
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: avoid; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 12pt 0in 0pt; 
LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="petrobras
sans,sans-serif">SECOND QUARTER OF 2016 RESULTS</FONT></B></P>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; PADDING-TOP: 0in; 
PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>Derived from consolidated interim financial information 
reviewed by independent auditors, prepared in accordance with International 
Financial Reporting Standards - IFRS.</FONT></P>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; TEXT-ALIGN: right; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 0in" align=right><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt"
color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Rio de Janeiro &#8211; August 11, 
2016</FONT></B></P>
<P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: 
medium none; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; PADDING-TOP: 0in; 
PADDING-LEFT: 0in; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" 
color=black face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Main financial 
highlights 2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Net income attributable to the 
shareholders of Petrobras of R$ 370 million, compared to net loss of R$ 1.246 
million in the 1Q-2016, as a result of:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
8.5pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">A decrease of 30% in net 
finance expenses; </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
8.5pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">An increase of 7% in crude 
oil and natural gas total production;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
8.5pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Higher revenues with an 
increase of 14% in crude oil and oil products exports and lower costs related to
natural gas imports;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
8.5pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Expenses related to the new 
Voluntary Separation Incentive Plan (PIDV); and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
8.5pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Impairment losses related to
Comperj assets. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The higher cash provided by 
operating activities and the decrease of capital expenditures and investments 
resulted in a positive free cash flow* for the fifth consecutive quarter of R$ 
10,790 million in the 2Q-2016, 3.5 times higher when compared to R$ 2,381 
million in the 1Q-2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Adjusted EBITDA* of R$ 20,317 
million in the 2Q-2016, 4% lower compared to the 1Q-2016. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Gross indebtedness decreased 19%, 
from R$ 493,023 million in December 31, 2015 to R$ 397,760 million, a reduction 
of R$ 95,263 million. Net debt* decreased 15%, from R$ 392,136 million to R$ 
332,390 million.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The ratio between net debt and the 
Last Twelve Months (LTM) Adjusted EBITDA<FONT style="COLOR: 
#000000">*</FONT><SUP>&nbsp;</SUP></FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
8.5pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> decreased from 5.31 as of 
December 31, 2015 to 4.49 as of June 30, 2016 and the leverage decreased from 
60% to 55%.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The issuing of global notes 
totaling US$ 6.75 billion and the tender offer of US$ 6.3 billion generated the 
increase of average maturity of outstanding debt from 7.14 years as of December 
31, 2015 to 7.30 years as of June 30, 2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 11pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Main operating 
highlights 2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Total crude oil and natural gas 
production was 2,804 thousand barrels of oil equivalent per day (boed), an 
increase of 7% compared to the 1Q-2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Domestic oil products output 
decreased 2% to 1,919 thousand barrels per day (bpd) and the domestic sales 
increased 3% to 2,109 thousand bpd.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal;
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Crude oil and oil products exports 
increased 14% to 515 thousand bpd and average Brent price increased 34% to 
US$/bbl 45.57. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 3pt 0in 3pt 7.1pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -7.1pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" color=black 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" color=black 
face="times new roman">&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Reduction of 55% in LNG imports due
to higher domestic gas supply and lower thermoelectric demand.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=center>
<IMG border=0 src="fp01a.gif">&nbsp;</P>

face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT style="COLOR: #000000">*</FONT>&nbsp;See 
definitions of Free cash flow, Adjusted EBITDA, LTM Adjusted EBITDA and Net Debt
in glossary and the respective reconciliations in Liquidity and Capital 
Resources, Reconciliation of Adjusted EBITDA, Debt and LTM Adjusted EBITDA.

Sans,sans-serif">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 6pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">This release includes forward-looking
statements within the meaning of Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933, as
amended, and Section 21E of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended,
that are subject to risks and uncertainties. The forward-looking statements,
which address the Company&#8217;s expected business and financial performance, 
among
other matters, contain words such as &#8220;believe,&#8221; 
&#8220;expect,&#8221; &#8220;estimate,&#8221;
&#8220;anticipate,&#8221; &#8220;optimistic,&#8221; &#8220;intend,&#8221; 
&#8220;plan,&#8221; &#8220;aim,&#8221; &#8220;will,&#8221; &#8220;may,&#8221; 
&#8220;should,&#8221;
&#8220;could,&#8221; &#8220;would,&#8221; &#8220;likely,&#8221; and similar 
expressions. Readers are cautioned not
to place undue reliance on these forward-looking statements, which speak only as
of the date on which they are made. There is no assurance that the expected
events, trends or results will actually occur. We undertake no obligation to
publicly update or revise any forward-looking statements, whether as a result of
new information or future events or for any other reason.</FONT></B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%"><STRONG></STRONG>&nbsp;</P></FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 6pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">The Company&#8217;s actual results could differ
materially from those expressed or forecast in any forward-looking statements as
a result of a variety of assumptions and factors. These factors include, but are
not limited to, the following: (i) failure to comply with laws or regulations,
including fraudulent activity, corruption, and bribery; (ii) the outcome of
ongoing corruption investigations and any new facts or information that may
arise in relation to the &#8220;Lava Jato Operation&#8221;; (iii) the 
effectiveness of the
Company&#8217;s risk management policies and procedures, including operational 
risk;
and (iv) litigation, such as class actions or proceedings brought by
governmental and regulatory agencies. A description of other factors can be
found in the Company&#8217;s Annual Report on Form 20-F for the year ended 
December
31, 2015, and the Company&#8217;s other filings with the U.S. Securities and 
Exchange
Commission.</FONT></B></FONT></P></FONT>

<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>&nbsp; <A name=page_4></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader4"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="POSITION: relative"></FONT><FONT 
size=+0><FONT size=+0><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P align=center><IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg src="x16081123203400.jpg"
width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"><STRONG>2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016 Results</STRONG><FONT style="COLOR: 
#000000">*</FONT></FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" color=black 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"><STRONG>:</STRONG></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Gross Profit </FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Gross profit
increased by 9% when compared to the 1Q-2016, reaching R$ 22,821 million, due to
higher sales revenues, mainly as a result of crude oil and oil products export
volumes. This increase was partially offset by lower gasoline sales in Brazilian
market and decreased power generation.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Lower import
costs of crude oil and natural gas were registered in the 2Q-2016 due to higher
domestic production and lower thermoelectric generation, partially offset by
higher expenses with production taxes and oil products imports.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Operating Income</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Operating
income reached R$ 7,184 million in the 2Q-2016, compared to a R$ 8,148 million
operating income in the 1Q-2016, mainly due to e</FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT:
150%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">xpenses with the new Voluntary Separation
Incentive Plan (PIDV), to impairment of Comperj assets (due to the project
reassessment) and to the return of exploratory blocks. In addition, there were
higher general and administrative expenses, as a result of increased consulting
expenses. </FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Net Finance Expense</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Net finance
expense was R$ 6,061 million in the 2Q-2016, a 30% decrease compared to the
1Q-2016, mainly due to the </FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">appreciation
of the U.S. dollar against the Euro.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Net Income (Loss) attributable to the
shareholders of Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: normal" color=windowtext 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The net income in the 2Q-2016 was R$ 370
million, reverting the loss occurred in 1Q-1016, mainly due to higher gross
profit and lower net finance expenses.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Adjusted EBITDA and Free Cash
Flow</FONT></B><FONT style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: super"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face=symbol>**</FONT></B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The Adjusted
EBITDA was 4% lower compared to the 1Q-2016, totaling R$ 20,317 million. The
Adjusted EBITDA Margin was 28% in the 2Q-2016. The increased net cash provided
by operating activities and the lower capital expenditures and investments
resulted, for the fifth consecutive quarter, in higher positive free cash flow*
of R$ 10,790 million, 3.5 times higher when compared to the 1Q-2016. This result
represents an important effort to deleverage the Company.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
150%">&nbsp;</P><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 150%" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>
<HR align=left SIZE=1 width="33%">
<DIV id=ftn3><FONT lang=PT-BR></FONT>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"><FONT 
style="COLOR: #000000">*</FONT>&nbsp;Additional information about operating
results of 2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016, see item 5.</FONT></P><FONT lang=PT-
BR></FONT></DIV>
<DIV id=ftn4><FONT lang=PT-BR></FONT>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"><FONT 
color=#0000ff face=Symbol><SUP><FONT style="COLOR: 
#000000">**</FONT></SUP>&nbsp;</FONT>See definitions of Free cash
flow and Adjusted EBITDA in glossary and the respective reconciliations in
Liquidity and Capital Resources and Reconciliation of Adjusted
EBITDA.</FONT></P><FONT lang=PT-BR></FONT></DIV>

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="POSITION: relative"></FONT><FONT 
size=+0><FONT size=+0><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" face=Calibri,sans-

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-

<P align=center><IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg src="x16081123203400.jpg"
width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">1H-2016 x 1H-2015 Results<FONT style="COLOR: 
#000000">*</FONT></FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" 
color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">:</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Gross Profit </FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Gross profit
decreased by 9% when compared to 1H-2015, reaching R$ 43,829 million due to
lower sales revenues, as a result of an 7% reduction of domestic sales for oil
products, partially offset by higher diesel and gasoline margins. The decrease
in sales revenues was also a result of a decrease of crude oil and oil products
export prices, lower power generation, decreased electricity prices, and lower
domestic natural gas sales volume.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The Company
experienced lower import costs and decreased production taxes in Brazil due to
lower crude oil prices and decreased sales. However, higher depreciation
expenses occurred as a result of a decrease in reserves estimates (mainly due to
lower crude oil prices), which were partially offset by a lower carrying amount
of assets that were impacted by impairment losses in 2015. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Operating Income</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Operating
income was R$ 15,332 million in 1H-2016, a 32% decrease when compared to the
1H-2015, resulting from decreased gross profit, higher idleness expenses related
to drilling rigs, higher expenses with legal proceedings, expenses associated
with the new Voluntary Separation Incentive Plan and with the return of
exploratory blocks. In addition, the 1H-2015 was impacted by the reversal of
losses related to trade receivables from companies in the electricity sector.
These effects were partially offset by lower tax expenses.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Net Finance Expense</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Net finance
expense was R$ 14,754 million in the 1H-2016, an additional net expense of R$
3,085 million when compared to the 1H-2015, resulting from higher interest
expenses due to higher debt and to the effect of the depreciation of Brazilian
Real against the U.S. dollar.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Net Income (loss) attributable to the
shareholders of Petrobras</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Net loss
attributable to the shareholders of Petrobras of R$ 876 million in the 1H-2016,
mainly due to lower operating income, higher net finance expenses and to the
effect of foreign exchange translation over the debt of structured companies in
U.S. dollars that impacted net income attributable to non-controlling
interests.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Adjusted EBITDA and Free Cash
Flow</FONT></B><FONT style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: super"><B><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face=symbol>**</FONT></B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Adjusted
EBITDA of R$ 41,408 million in the 1H-2016, remaining relatively flat compared
to the 1H-2015. The Adjusted EBITDA Margin was 29% in the 1H-2016. The lower
capital expenditures and investments resulted in positive free cash flow of R$
13,171 million. This result represents an important effort to deleverage the
Company.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 150%"><FONT 
face=Arial></FONT>&nbsp;</P><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 150%" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT>
<HR align=left SIZE=1 width="33%">
<DIV id=ftn5><FONT lang=PT-BR></FONT>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"><FONT 
face=Symbol><FONT style="COLOR: 
#000000"><SUP>*</SUP></FONT>&nbsp;</FONT>Additional information
about operating results of 1H-2016 x 1H-2015, see item 6.</FONT></P><FONT 
lang=PT-BR></FONT></DIV>
<DIV id=ftn6><FONT lang=PT-BR></FONT>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"><FONT 
color=#0000ff face=Symbol><SUP><FONT style="COLOR: 
#000000">**</FONT></SUP>&nbsp;</FONT>See definitions of Free cash
flow and Adjusted EBITDA in glossary and the respective reconciliations in
Liquidity and Capital Resources and Reconciliation of Adjusted
EBITDA.</FONT></P><FONT lang=PT-BR></FONT></DIV>
<a name="_bclFooter5"></a><DIV><FONT size=+0></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" color=#0f243e><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" color=#0f243e 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>&nbsp;</FONT></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" 
face=Calibri>5</FONT></P>

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT

sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif">EXPLORATION &amp; PRODUCTION</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Gross Profit</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 width="97%" 
border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The decrease in gross 
profit in the
      1H-2016 was generated by decreased Brent prices and by lower crude oil and
      NGL production in Brazil and abroad, partially offset by the depreciation
      of the Real against the U.S. dollar. In addition, gross profit was
      impacted by higher depreciation costs, partially offset by lower
      production taxes.</FONT><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT></B></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016):</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> The increase of the gross
profit in the
      2Q-2016 was generated by increased Brent prices and by higher crude oil
      and natural gas production, partially offset by the appreciation of the
      Real against the U.S. dollar and by increased production taxes.
</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Operating Income</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 width="97%" 
border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The decrease in operating 
income was due
      to lower gross profit, to increased idleness expenses related to drilling
      rigs, to expenses related to legal proceedings, to the new Voluntary
      Separation Incentive Plan and to higher expenses mainly due to the return
      of exploratory blocks.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The operating income was 
due to higher
      gross profit and lower impairment, partially offset by expenses related to
      legal proceedings, to the new Voluntary Separation Incentive Plan and to
      higher expenses mainly due to the return of exploratory
    blocks.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Operating Performance</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Production</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 width="97%" 
border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Domestic crude oil and NGL production
      decreased by 3% mainly due to higher realization of scheduled stoppages,
      mainly in P-48, P-53, FPSO Cid. Paraty and P-18 platforms. However, there
      were start-up and ramp-up of new systems, mainly FPSO Cid. </FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Itagua&#237; (Lula 
&#8211;
      Iracema Norte area), FPSO Cid. Maric&#225; (Lula Alto) and P-58 (Parque 
das
      Baleias). </FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Natural
      gas production in Brazil remained relatively flat because the scheduled
      stoppages mentioned above were mainly offset by increased gas production
      of P-58 (Parque das Baleias) and by the production start-up of FPSO Cid.
      Maric&#225; (Lula Alto). </FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Crude
      oil and NGL production abroad decreased 12% mainly as a result of the
      sale/return of fields in Argentina, and of the scheduled stoppage of Akpo
      field in Nigeria.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Gas
      production abroad increased 11% due to the production ramp-up in the
      Hadrian South field in the United States.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016):</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">
      Domestic crude oil and NGL production increased 8% mainly due to lower
      realization of scheduled stoppages and to the production ramp-up of FPSO
      Cid. Maric&#225; (Lula Alto). These effects also generated a 5% increase 
of
      domestic gas production. </FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Crude
      oil and NGL production abroad increased 2%, mainly due to the production
      return in Akpo field in Nigeria, which was under scheduled stoppage in the
      1Q-2016.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Gas
      production abroad increased 9% due to new wells in the Hadrian South field
      in the United States.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Lifting Cost </FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 width="97%" 
border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Excluding foreign exchange variation
      effects, lifting cost in U.S. dollar decreased due to lower expenses with
      well intervention and with engineering and submarine maintenance, in
addition to the higher share of pre-salt production, which has a lower
      unit cost.</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">In
      addition, production taxes decreased as a result of lower crude oil
      price.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Lifting
      cost decreased abroad due to the sale of Austral Basin fields in
      Argentina, with higher operating costs and to the higher production in the
      United States, with lower costs. </FONT></P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Excluding foreign exchange
variation
      effects,</FONT><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">lifting cost in
      US$ dollar decreased due to higher production in the period. This decrease
      was partially offset by higher well intervention expenses.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">In
      addition, the higher crude oil price generated increased production
      taxes.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">The
      decreased lifting cost abroad was impacted by lower costs in
      Argentina.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT>

<a name="_bclHeader8"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="POSITION: relative"></FONT><FONT 
size=+0><FONT size=+0><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>

alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg src="x16081123203400.jpg"
width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif">REFINING, TRANSPORTATION AND
MARKETING</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Gross Profit</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 width="100%" 
border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Gross
      profit increased due to a decrease in crude oil purchase/transfer costs,
      following lower Brent prices, the lower share of crude oil imports on
      feedstock processing and the decreased share of oil product imports in our
      sales mix. These effects were partially offset by lower crude oil exports
      and by lower economic activity in Brazil that decreased domestic oil
      product sales.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Gross
profit remained relatively flat in the period. The higher domestic and
      abroad sales were offset by higher purchase/transfer costs of crude oil as
      a result of the increase in Brent
price.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Operating Income</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 width="100%" 
border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015):
      </FONT></B></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif">Higher operating income due to higher
      gross profit, partially offset by impairment of Comperj assets due to the
      project reassessment.</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016):</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> Lower
      operating income mainly due to the impairment in Comperj assets and to the
      expenses of the new Voluntary Separation Incentive Plan.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Operating Performance</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Imports and Exports of Crude Oil and Oil
Products</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 width="100%" 
border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Improved balance of crude oil exports
      (imports) net, due to lower imports, as a result of decreased volume
      processed and a higher share of domestic crude oil on feedstock processed.
These effects were partially offset by decreased export volume available,
      as a result of the lower production. </FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">The
      decreased deficit of oil products exports (imports) net was due to lower
      need for diesel imports as a result of the lower economic
      activity.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; BORDER-LEFT: 
medium none; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">(2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Higher positive balance of crude oil
      exports (imports) net, due to higher domestic production that
      generated</FONT><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras
Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">higher share of
      domestic crude oil on feedstock processed, lower import need and increased
      crude oil available for export.</FONT></P>
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; BORDER-LEFT: 
medium none; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The
      decreased deficit of oil products exports (imports) net was due to lower
      need of gasoline imports as a result of decreased demand, and of diesel
      imports, due to the inventories generated in the 1Q-2016. </FONT></P>
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; BORDER-LEFT: 
medium none; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Refining Operations</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 width="100%" 
border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015):</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> Daily feedstock processed
was 5% lower,
      due to scheduled stoppages, mainly in distillation plants of REPLAN and
      REVAP, partially offset by higher production of RNEST, as a result of
      </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: normal" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">operating improvements
made.</FONT></P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Daily feedstock processed 
remained
      relatively flat, because the return of REPLAN into operation, after
      scheduled stoppage, was offset by scheduled stoppages of REFAP and REVAP.
      </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Refining Cost</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 width="100%" 
border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015):</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> Refining cost in 
R$/barrel increased 7%
      mainly due to higher personnel expenses as a result of higher employee
      compensation costs attributable to the 2015/2016 Collective Bargaining
      Agreement, along with a decrease in feedstock processed. Refining cost, in
      US$/barrel, decreased by 14%. </FONT></P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016):</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> In R$/barrel, refining 
cost decreased by
      2% mainly due to lower expenses with bulk materials and technical
      services. Refining cost, in US$/barrel, increased by
  8%.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" 
face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT>

      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-

2015</FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD></TR>
  <TR>
    <TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1.5pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="37%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-HEIGHT:
normal"><FONT style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: super"><FONT style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: 
baseline"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-

BOTTOM: medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium
none; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: super"><FONT 
style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: baseline"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">2,020</FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
    <TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1.5pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="9%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium
none; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: super"><FONT 
style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: baseline"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">2,188</FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
    <TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1.5pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="9%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-

    <TD style="BACKGROUND: #bcbdbc; BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1.5pt solid; PADDING-

      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-

<DIV id=ftn8><FONT lang=PT-BR></FONT>

of Consolidated Adjusted EBITDA Statement by Segment. </FONT></FONT></P><FONT

<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="POSITION: relative"></FONT><FONT

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif">GAS &amp; POWER</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Gross Profit</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 width="100%" 
border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Gross
      profit in the 1H-2016 was higher due to lower acquisition costs, mainly
      because of the reduction of natural gas and LNG imports. This effect was
      partially offset by lower natural gas sales to the thermoelectric sector
and by decreased electricity generation due to the improvement of
      hydrological conditions in Brazil.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The 
increased</FONT><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">gross
      profit was due to lower acquisition cost and decreased gas and LNG
      imports. These effect was partially offset by lower electricity generation
      in the 2Q-2016.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Operating Income</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 width="100%" 
border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Operating income increased due to higher
      gross profit and also to lower operating expenses. The 1H-2015 was mainly
      impacted by expenses related to tax contingencies and impairment,
      partially offset by the reversal of impairment with trade receivables from
      companies in the electricity sector.</FONT></P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Lower
      operating income in the </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">2Q-2016</FONT><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> 
</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: normal" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">compared to the 1Q-2016 due to
      higher</FONT><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">impairment with
      trade receivables from companies in the electricity sector.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Operating Performance</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Physical and Financial Indicators&nbsp;
</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=center>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="49%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Electricity sales to the Brazilian free
      contracting market (</FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Ambiente de Contrata&#231;&#227;o Livre &#8211;
      ACL</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">) were 5% lower, attributable to the
      termination of agreements. </FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Decreased electricity sales volumes to
      the Brazilian regulated market (</FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Ambiente de
      Contrata&#231;&#227;o Regulada &#8211; ACR</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">) was due to the
      termination of agreement representing 205 average MW, which occurred at
      Electricity Auction of 1H-2015.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">The
      decrease electricity generation and lower electricity prices in the spot
      market (PLD) were due to improved hydrological conditions.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">LNG
      imports decreased by 56% and natural gas imports from Bolivia were 10%
      lower, reflecting a decrease in thermoelectric demand.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="2%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="49%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016):</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> The
      higher electricity prices in the spot market (PLD) was a result of
      worsening in hydrological conditions.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">The
      lower electricity generation was due to the decision of the Electric
      Sector Monitoring Committee (</FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Comit&#234; de
      Monitoramento do Setor El&#233;trico</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> - CMSE) of not
      making plants dispatch for energy security with variable unit cost above
      settlement limits.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">LNG
      imports decreased by 55% and natural gas imports from Bolivia were 10%
      lower due to decreased thermoelectric demand in the period and to higher
      domestic gas supply, due to 5% increase on production. </FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" 
face=calibri,sans-serif></FONT>
<a name="_bclFooter10"></a><DIV><FONT size=+0></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" color=#0f243e><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" color=#0f243e 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>&nbsp;</FONT></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" 
face=Calibri>10</FONT></P>
<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>

<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader11"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="POSITION: relative"></FONT><FONT 
size=+0><FONT size=+0><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" color=black face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Gas &amp; Power Main Indicators</FONT></B></P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 100%" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 
border=0>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 14.05pt">
    <TD style="HEIGHT: 14.05pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="37%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-HEIGHT:
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="HEIGHT: 14.05pt; BACKGROUND: #006298; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in;

Reconciliation of Consolidated Adjusted EBITDA Statement by Segment.
