<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif">DISTRIBUTION</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Gross Profit</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 width="100%" 
border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Gross
      profit decreased due to lower sales volumes in Brazil, following the lower
      economic activity that mainly impacted industrial customers, in which the
      share of BR Distribuidora is higher than its competitors. These effects
      were partially offset by improved result abroad, due to higher gross
      margin as a result of increased mix of sales products in Paraguay and of
      the positive impact of foreign exchange variation.</FONT></P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT:
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The
      lower gross profit in Brazil was due to decreased ethanol and gasoline C
      prices, which impacted inventory costs, and lower sales volumes, partially
      offset by improved result abroad due to higher gross margin, as a result
      of increased mix of sales products in Paraguay and of the positive impact
      of foreign exchange variation.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Operating income</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 width="100%" 
border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Operating income in Brazil decreased as a
      result of higher losses with tax contingencies, partially offset by
      improved result abroad.</FONT></P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The higher operating 
income was due to
      </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">lower impairment with trade receivables
      from companies in the electricity sector in Brazil, and</FONT><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">
      </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; FONT-WEIGHT: normal" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">to the improved result
    abroad.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Operating Performance</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Market Share - Brazil</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=center>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 100%" 
cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1H-2016 x 1H-2015): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Decreased market share was due to lower
      sales to the thermoelectric sector and lower economic activity that mainly
      impacted industrial customers, in which the share of BR Distribuidora is
      higher than its competitors. In addition, the lower market share is a
      result of a shift in our sales policy to prioritize higher margins instead
      of sales volumes.</FONT></P>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(2Q-2016 x 1Q-2016): </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt; 
FONT-WEIGHT: normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Market share was lower 
mainly due to a
      decrease in fuel oil thermoelectric dispatch, to lower gasoline and jet
      fuel sales. In addition, the Company policy was to maintain margins
      preserved.</FONT><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">
</FONT></B></P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" 
face="times new roman"></FONT>

    <TD style="BACKGROUND: #bcbdbc; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; 
PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="10%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium
none; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="10%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium
none; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="10%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium
none; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">As of June
30, 2016, the balance of cash and cash equivalents was R$ 62,940 million and the
balance of adjusted cash and cash equivalents for the same period was R$ 65,370
million. Our principal uses of funds in the 1H-2016 were for repayment of
long-term financing (and interest payments) and for capital expenditures. We
partially met these requirements with cash provided by operating activities of
R$ 39,250 million and with proceeds from long-term financing of R$ 32,679
million. The balance of adjusted cash and cash equivalents was negatively
impacted in the 1H-2016 by foreign exchange rate variation applied on our
foreign financial investments.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Net cash
provided by operating activities of R$ 39,250 million was mainly generated by
higher diesel and gasoline margins, lower production taxes in Brazil and crude
oil, oil products and natural gas&nbsp; imports costs, along with a higher share
of domestic crude oil on feedstock processing. These effects were partially
offset by lower prices of crude oil and oil products exports and decreased sales
volume in Brazil due to lower economic activity.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Capital
expenditures and investments in operating segments were R$ 26,079 million in the
1H-2016 (89% in E&amp;P business segment), a 25% decrease when compared to the
1H-2015. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Free cash
flow* was positive, amounting R$ 13,171 million in the 1H-2016, for the fifth
consecutive quarter.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">From
January to June 2016, the Company issued global notes in international capital
markets totaling US$ 6.75 billion, with maturities of 5 and 10 years, and the
proceeds of those notes offerings were used to tender for US$ 6.3 billion of
Petrobras&#8217;s existing global notes. In addition, the Company entered into a
sale
and leaseback operation with the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC)
in the amount of US$ 1 billion. The average maturity of outstanding debt was
7.30 years as of June 30, 2016 (7.14 years as of December 31, 2015). It is
important to mention the issuing of US$ 3 billion for tender offer at the same
amount in July 2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Repayments
of interest and principal were R$ 69,778 million in the 1H-2016 and the nominal
cash flow (cash view), including principal and interest payments, by maturity,
is set out in R$ million as follows:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8.5pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>

<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>
<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>&nbsp; <A name=page_15></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader15"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="POSITION: 
relative"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT size=+0><FONT size=+0><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P align=center><IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg src="x16081123203400.jpg"
width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT size=+0><FONT size=+0><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" color=black 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Consolidated debt</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Consolidated
gross debt in Reais decreased by 19% and net debt decreased by 15% when compared
to December 31, 2015, mainly as a result of the 17.8% foreign exchange
appreciation. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Current debt
and non-current debt include finance lease obligations of R$ 80 million and R$
313 million on June 30, 2016, respectively (R$ 73 million and R$ 303 million on
December 31, 2015).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=left><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; LAYOUT-GRID-MODE: line" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>

<DIV id=ftn12><FONT lang=PT-BR></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT style="COLOR:
#000000"><SUP>*</SUP></FONT>&nbsp;See definition of adjusted cash
and cash equivalents, net debt, total net liabilities and LTM Adjusted EBITDA in
glossary and reconciliation in Reconciliation of Adjusted EBITDA.

<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>
<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>&nbsp; <A name=page_16></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader16"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="POSITION: relative"></FONT><FONT 
size=+0><FONT size=+0><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P align=center><IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg src="x16081123203400.jpg"
width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">ADDITIONAL
INFORMATION</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0in 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">1.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Reconciliation of Adjusted
EBITDA</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Our adjusted
EBITDA (according to CVM Instruction 527 of October 4, 2012) is the net income
before net finance income (expense), income taxes, depreciation, depletion and
amortization, share of earnings in equity-accounted investments and
impairment.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Adjusted
EBITDA is not a measure defined in the International Financial Reporting
Standards &#8211; IFRS. In addition, Adjusted EBITDA may not be comparable to 
the
calculation of Adjusted EBITDA by other companies and it should not be
considered as a substitute for any measure calculated in accordance with IFRS.
The Company reports its Adjusted EBITDA to give additional information about its
profitability and must be considered in connection with other measures and
performance indicators for a better understanding regarding the Company's
financial performance.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">The LTM
Adjusted EBITDA is used to calculate the ratio of net debt/LTM Adjusted EBITDA,
that corresponds to a metric included in the Company&#8217;s Business and 
Management
Plan. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 100%" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 
border=0>

  <TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt;

      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-

    <TD style="BORDER-TOP: #006298 2px solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP:

      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-

    <TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1.5pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-

      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium

serif">(1,102)</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">The decreased reclassification of foreign
exchange variation expenses from the Shareholders&#8217; Equity to the Statement
of
Income was mainly due to the fact that the 1Q-2016 was impacted by planned
exports that were no longer expected to occur or did not occur, mainly due to
the decrease in crude oil prices. Decreased planned export volumes were no
longer expected to occur or did not occur in the 2Q-2016.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">Additional hedging relationships may be revoked
or additional reclassification adjustments from equity to the Statement of
Income may occur as a result of changes in forecast export prices and export
volumes following a review in the Company&#8217;s business plan. Based on a
sensitivity analysis considering a US$ 10/barrel decrease in average Brent
prices stress scenario, when compared to the Brent price projections in our most
recent update of the 2015-2019 Business and Management Plan (</FONT><I><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">Plano de Neg&#243;cios e Gest&#227;o</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">
&#8211; PNG), a R$1,141 million reclassification adjustment from 
Shareholders&#8217; Equity
to the statement of income would occur.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">The expected annual realization of the foreign
exchange variation balance in shareholders&#8217; equity, on June 30, 2016, is 
set out
below:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 100%" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 
border=0>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 12pt">
    <TD style="HEIGHT: 12pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="24%">
      <P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="HEIGHT: 12pt; BACKGROUND: #006298; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="76%" 
colSpan=10>
      <P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal" 
align=center><B><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" color=white face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif">Consolidated</FONT></B></P></TD></TR>
  <TR style="HEIGHT: 6pt">
    <TD style="HEIGHT: 6pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT:
3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="24%">
      <P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="HEIGHT: 6pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT:
3pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 3pt" vAlign=bottom width="7%">

<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>
<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>&nbsp; <A name=page_18></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader18"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="POSITION: 
relative"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT size=+0><FONT size=+0><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P align=center><IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg src="x16081123203400.jpg"
width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT size=+0><FONT size=+0><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">ADDITIONAL
INFORMATION</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0in 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; TEXT-INDENT: 
-14.2pt"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">3.</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new 
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT></B><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Assets and Liabilities subject to Exchange
Variation</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The Company
has assets and liabilities subject to foreign exchange rate variation, for which
the main gross exposures are the Real relative to the U.S. dollar and the U.S.
dollar relative to the Euro. Beginning in mid-May 2013, the Company extended the
use of hedge accounting to hedge highly probable future exports. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The Company
designates hedging relationships between exports and its long-term debt
obligations (denominated in U.S. dollars) to simultaneously recognize the
effects of the existing natural foreign exchange hedge between those operations
in its financial statements. Through the extension of the hedge accounting
practice, foreign exchange gains or losses, generated by foreign exchange
variation, are recognized in our shareholders&#8217; equity and will only affect
the
statement of income at the moment of realization of future exports. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">The balances
of assets and liabilities in foreign currency of our foreign subsidiaries are
not included in our foreign exchange rate variation exposure below when
transacted in a currency equivalent to their respective functional
currencies.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">As of June
30, 2016, the Company had a net liability exposure to foreign exchange rates, of
which the main exposure is the relation between U.S. dollar and euro.</FONT></P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 100%" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 
border=0>
<TR>
    <TD style="BORDER-RIGHT: white 1.5pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 4.25pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 4.25pt" width="80%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-HEIGHT:
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">ITEMS</FONT></B></P></TD>
    <TD style="BORDER-RIGHT: white 1.5pt solid; BACKGROUND: #006298; BORDER-
BOTTOM: white 1.5pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 
4.25pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 4.25pt" width="20%" colSpan=2>
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: center; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: 
medium none; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
color=white face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">R$ million</FONT></B></P></TD></TR>
  <TR style="HEIGHT: 4.8pt">
    <TD style="HEIGHT: 4.8pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 4.25pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 4.25pt" vAlign=bottom width="80%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-HEIGHT:
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="HEIGHT: 4.8pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 4.25pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 4.25pt" vAlign=top width="10%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-HEIGHT:
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 3pt; FONT-WEIGHT: normal" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="BORDER-TOP: white 1.5pt solid; HEIGHT: 4.8pt; PADDING-BOTTOM:

normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">80</FONT></P></TD>
    <TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #006298 1.5pt solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-
TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" width="9%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium
none; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">(1,102)</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>

    <TD style="HEIGHT: 12.75pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-
LEFT: 0in; PADDING-RIGHT: 0in" vAlign=bottom width="36%">
      <P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT style="FONT-
SIZE: 8pt" color=black face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD>
    <TD style="HEIGHT: 12.75pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-

      <P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT style="FONT-

      <P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US

items are related to the Company&#8217;s businesses and based on 
Management&#8217;s
judgement have been highlighted and are presented as additional information to
provide a better understanding of the Company&#8217;s performance. These items 
are
presented when relevant and do not necessarily occur in all periods.</FONT></P>

<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>&nbsp; <A name=page_20></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader20"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="POSITION: relative"></FONT><FONT 
size=+0><FONT size=+0><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P align=center><IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg src="x16081123203400.jpg"
width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">ADDITIONAL
INFORMATION</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">5. Results of
Operations of 2Q-2016 compared to 1Q-2016:</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Sales
revenues of R$ 71,320 million in the 2Q-2016, a 1% increase when compared to the
1Q-2016 (R$ 70,337 million), due to:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">Higher crude oil and oil product export
revenues; and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">Higher domestic sales of naphtha (55%) and
diesel (2%).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">These effects
were partially offset by lower domestic gasoline sales and decreased electricity
revenue, reflecting lower power generation. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Cost of sales
of R$ 48,499 million in the 2Q-2016, a 2% decrease compared to R$ 49,329 million
in the 1Q-2016, due to lower crude oil and natural gas import costs, partially
offset by the increase of production taxes and oil products imports.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">General and
administrative expenses were R$ 2,844 million in the 2Q-2016, a 7% increase when
compared to the 1Q-2016 (R$ 2,652 million), due to higher third-party service
expenses.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Exploration
costs were R$ 1,641 million in the 2Q-2016, a 43% increase when compared to the
1Q-2016 (R$ 1,147 million), mainly generated by the return of exploratory blocks
due to their economic viability. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Other
expenses, net were R$ 6,509 million in the 2Q-2016, a 53% increase when compared
to R$ 4,265 million in the 1Q-2016, mainly as a result of:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">Expenses with the new Voluntary Separation
Incentive Plan (R$ 1,212 million); and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.5in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt"
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">Impairment of Comperj assets (R$ 1,124
million), due to the project reassessment that generated the review of time
schedule and completion costs of refining units of the Natural Gas Processing
Unit (UPGN).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Net finance
expense decreased by 30% to R$ 6,061 million in the 2Q-2016, from R$ 8,693
million in the 1Q-2016, mainly as a result of foreign exchange gains of R$ 910
million attributable to a 3.1% appreciation of the U.S. dollar against the Euro
and its impact on the Company&#8217;s net debt in the 2Q-2016, compared to the 
foreign
exchange losses of R$ 1,443 million attributable to a 4.7% foreign exchange
depreciation in the 1Q-2016 (R$ 2,353 million).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Income taxes
expenses (corporate income tax and social contribution) of R$ 622 million in the
2Q-2016, a 178% increase when compared to R$ 224 million in the 1Q-2016, mainly
due to the negative result in the 1Q-2016. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Loss
attributable to non-controlling interests of R$ 529 million in the 2Q-2016, a
39% decrease when compared to the 1Q-2016 (loss of R$ 865 million), mainly
reflecting the impact of foreign exchange variation on debt in U.S. dollar of
structured entities in the period.</FONT></P><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT>
<a name="_bclFooter20"></a><DIV><FONT size=+0></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" color=#0f243e><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" color=#0f243e 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>&nbsp;</FONT></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" 
face=Calibri>20</FONT></P>
<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>
<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>&nbsp; <A name=page_21></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader21"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="POSITION: relative"></FONT><FONT 
size=+0><FONT size=+0><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P align=center><IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg src="x16081123203400.jpg"
width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN: 6pt 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">ADDITIONAL
INFORMATION</FONT></B></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">6. Results of
Operations of 1H-2016 compared to 1H-2015:</FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Sales
revenues of R$ 141,657 million in the 1H-2016, a 8% decrease when compared to
the 1H-2015 (R$ 154,296 million), due to:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 28.35pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal;
TEXT-INDENT: -14.15pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Decreased
domestic sales for oil products (7%), reflecting lower economic activity in
Brazil and decreased diesel and fuel oil consumption for thermoelectric
generation;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 28.35pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal;
TEXT-INDENT: -14.15pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Decreased
electricity generation and prices due to improved hydrological conditions and
decreased domestic natural gas sales volumes; and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 28.35pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal;
TEXT-INDENT: -14.15pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Lower crude
oil and oil product export prices as a result of lower international crude oil
prices.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal; 
TEXT-INDENT: -14.2pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 14.2pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">These effects
were partially offset by higher margins of diesel and gasoline.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Cost of sales
of R$ 97,828 million in the 1H-2016, a 8% decrease compared to R$ 106,324
million in the 1H-2015, reflecting lower crude oil, oil products and natural gas
import costs, as well as lower production taxes in Brazil. These effects were
partially offset by higher depreciation expenses as a result of a decrease in
estimated reserves (based on the unit of production method), partially offset by
lower carrying amounts of assets impacted by the impairment losses recognized in
2015. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Selling
expenses were R$ 7,441 million in the 1H-2016, a 33% increase compared to R$
5,610 million in the 1H-2015, mainly due to the reversal of impairment of trade
receivables from companies in the electricity sector in the 1Q-2015 (R$ 1,295
million) and higher freight expenses in 2016, following the depreciation of the
Brazilian Real against the U.S. dollar.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Exploration
costs were R$ 2,788 million in the 1H-2016, a 16% increase compared to R$ 2,403
million in the 1H-2015, mainly generated by the return of exploratory blocks due
to their economic viability.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Other taxes
were R$ 988 million in the 1H-2016, a 79% decrease compared to R$ 4,713 million
in the 1H-2015, mainly due to the burden of tax on financial operations (Imposto
sobre Opera&#231;&#245;es Financeiras - IOF) applicable to intercompany loans 
made by
Petrobras to foreign subsidiaries and to the VAT tax (Imposto sobre a 
Circula&#231;&#227;o
de Mercadorias e Servi&#231;os) on the acquisition of natural gas recognized in 
the
1H-2015. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Other income
and expenses, net were R$ 10,774 million in the 1H-2016, a 76% increase when
compared to R$ 6,139 million in the 1H-2015, as a result of:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 28.35pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal;
TEXT-INDENT: -14.15pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Increased
unschedulled stoppages and pre-operating expenses, mainly with drilling rigs
idleness (R$ 2,392 million); </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 28.35pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal;
TEXT-INDENT: -14.15pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Higher
expenses related to legal proceedings, mainly in connection with labor and civil
lawsuits (R$ 1,835 million); and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 28.35pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal;
TEXT-INDENT: -14.15pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Expenses with
the new Voluntary Separation Incentive Plan (R$ 1,213 million).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Net finance
expenses increased by 26% to R$ 14,754 million in the 1H-2016, from R$ 11,669
million in the 1H-2015, as a result of:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 28.35pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal;
TEXT-INDENT: -14.15pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Higher
interest expenses due to higher debt and to the effect of the depreciation of
the average Brazilian Real against the U.S. dollar (R$ 3,453 million, net of
capitalized borrowing costs); </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 28.35pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal;
TEXT-INDENT: -14.15pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Foreign
exchange gains of R$ 590 million generated by the impact of a 17.8% appreciation
of the Brazilian Real against the U.S. dollar on the Company&#8217;s net debt in
the
1H-2016, compared to foreign exchange losses of R$ 2,937 million generated by
the impact of a 16.8% depreciation in the 1H-2015 (R$ 3,527 million);</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 28.35pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal;
TEXT-INDENT: -14.15pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">The higher
reclassification of cumulative foreign exchange variation from 
shareholders&#8217;
equity to net income due to occurred exports designated for cash flow hedge
accounting, and to a portion of future exports that were previously designated
but were no longer expected to occur or did not occur (R$ 3,066
million);</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 28.35pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal;
TEXT-INDENT: -14.15pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Foreign
exchange losses of R$ 533 million caused by the impact of a 1.4% depreciation of
the U.S. dollar against the Euro on the Company&#8217;s net debt in the 1H-2016,
compared to foreign exchange gains of R$ 1,563 million caused by the impact of
an 8.2% appreciation in the 1H-2015 (R$ 2,096 million); and </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 28.35pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal;
TEXT-INDENT: -14.15pt"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" 
face=symbol>&#183;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" face="times new
roman">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Foreign
exchange gains of R$ 970 million caused by the impact of a 10.7% appreciation of
the U.S. dollar against the Pound Sterling on the Company&#8217;s net debt in 
the
1H-2016, compared to foreign exchange losses of R$ 80 million caused by the
impact of a 0.9% depreciation in the 1H-2015 (R$ 1,050 million).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Share of
earnings in equity-accounted investments were R$ 786 million, a 130% increase
when compared to R$ 342 million in the 1H-2015, mainly due to impairment losses
in investee companies of Exploration and Production and Biofuels segments in the
1H-2015, as a result of decreased crude oil prices and higher discount rates,
due to an increase in Brazil&#8217;s risk premium resulting from a credit risk
downgrade (losing its investment grade status).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Income taxes
(corporate income tax and social contribution) were R$ 846 million in the
1H-2016, a 85% decrease compared to R$ 5,696 million in the 1H-2015, mainly due
to lower taxable income before income taxes and decreased corporate income tax
and social contribution tax expenses in Brazil over income earned abroad.
</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 6pt 0in; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Loss related
to non-controlling interests were R$ 1,394 million in the 1H-2016 (a R$ 425
million gain in the 1H-2015), mainly reflecting the impact of foreign exchange
variation on debt of structured entities in U.S. dollars in the
period.</FONT></P><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" face=calibri,sans-
serif></FONT>
<a name="_bclFooter21"></a><DIV><FONT size=+0></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" color=#0f243e><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" color=#0f243e 
face=Calibri,sans-serif>&nbsp;</FONT></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" 
face=Calibri>21</FONT></P>

    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt;

      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-

    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt;

  <TR>

    <TD style="BACKGROUND: #bcbdbc; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in;

    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt;

      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-

  <TR>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="50%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 10pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; LINE-
HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Sales
      revenues</FONT></P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="10%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium
none; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">141,657</FONT></P></TD>
    <TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="10%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium
none; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">154,296</FONT></P></TD>
    <TD style="BACKGROUND: #bcbdbc; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; 
PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="10%">
      <P style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-
BOTTOM: medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium
none; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">71,320</FONT></P></TD>

<DIV id=ftn13 style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%"><FONT lang=PT-
BR></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 
115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 7pt" 
face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><SUP><FONT style="COLOR: 
#000000">*</FONT></SUP>&nbsp;See definitions of Adjusted EBITDA in
glossary. </FONT></FONT></P><FONT lang=PT-BR></FONT></DIV>
<a name="_bclFooter29"></a><DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 
0%"><FONT size=+0></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" color=#0f243e><FONT 
lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 13pt" color=#0f243e face=Calibri,sans-
serif>&nbsp;</FONT></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT lang=PT-BR 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" 
face=Calibri>29</FONT></P>
<HR align=center SIZE=2 width="100%" noShade>
<DIV style="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: always">&nbsp;</DIV>
&nbsp; <A name="page_30"></A>
<DIV style="PADDING-LEFT: 0%; PADDING-RIGHT: 0%">
<a name="_bclHeader30"></a><DIV>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><FONT style="POSITION: 
relative"></FONT><FONT><FONT><FONT lang=PT-BR style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" 
face=Calibri,sans-serif></FONT></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P align=center>
<IMG 
alt=Network:Clientes:PETROBRAS:CONTRATO:relatorios_financeiros:07_Layouts:Aprova
dos:RMF2:imagens:07_PET_apresentacao_relatorios_rm.jpg src="x16081123203400.jpg"
width=809 height=128></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: normal"><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 9pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV align=left>
<TABLE style="BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM:
medium none; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; WIDTH: 100%" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 
border=0>
<TR>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="51%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif">Glossary </FONT></B></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 4pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">ACL &#8211;</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Ambiente de Contrata&#231;&#227;o 
Livre</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> (Free contracting market) in the electricity 
system.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">ACR -</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Ambiente de Contrata&#231;&#227;o 
Regulada</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> (Regulated contracting market) in the electricity 
system.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">ANP</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> - Brazilian National Petroleum, Natural Gas and Biofuels 
Agency.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Reference feedstock or installed capacity of primary 
processing</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> - Maximum sustainable feedstock processing reached at the 
distillation units at the end of each period, respecting the project limits of 
equipment and the safety, environment and product quality requirements. It is 
lower than the authorized capacity set by ANP (including temporary 
authorizations) and by environmental protection agencies.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Feedstock processed (excluding NGL) - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Daily volume of crude
oil processed in the Company&#180;s refineries in Brazil and is factored into 
the calculation of the Refining Plants Utilization Factor.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Feedstock processed &#8211; Brazil &#8211; </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Daily volume of crude 
oil and NGL processed.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Adjusted cash and cash equivalents - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Sum of cash and cash 
equivalents, government bonds and time deposits from highly rated financial 
institutions abroad with maturities of more than 3 months from the date of 
acquisition, considering the expected realization of those financial investments
in the short-term. This measure is not defined under the International Financial
Reporting Standards &#8211; IFRS and should not be considered in isolation or as
a substitute for cash and cash equivalents computed in accordance with IFRS. It 
may not be comparable to adjusted cash and cash equivalents of other companies, 
however management believes that it is an appropriate supplemental measure that 
helps investors assess our liquidity and supports leverage 
management.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">Adjusted EBITDA &#8211; </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
8pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Sum of EBITDA, share of earnings in 
equity-accounted investments and </FONT><I><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
8pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">impairment</FONT></I><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Net debt &#8211; </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Gross debt less adjusted cash and cash 
equivalents. Net debt is not a measure defined in the International Standards - 
IFRS and should not be considered in isolation or as a substitute for total 
long-term debt calculated in accordance with IFRS. Our calculation of net debt 
may not be comparable to the calculation of net debt by other companies. 
Management believes that net debt is an appropriate supplemental measure that 
helps investors assess our liquidity and supports leverage 
management.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT 
style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"><B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif">Consolidated Structured 
Entities</FONT></B></FONT><FONT style="LINE-HEIGHT: 115%" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="petrobras 
sans,sans-serif"> - Entities that have been designated so that voting or similar
rights are not the determining factor that decides who controls the entity. 
Petrobras has no share of earnings in investments in certain structured entities
that are consolidated in the financial statements, but the control is determined
by the power it has over its relevant operating activities. As there are no 
interests, the result came from certain consolidated structured entities is 
attributable to non-controlling interests in the income statement, and it is not
considered on net income attributable to shareholders of 
Petrobras.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT:
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Refining plants utilization factor (%) - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Feedstock processed 
(excluding NGL) divided by the reference feedstock.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Free cash flow -</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> Net cash provided by operating activities less
capital expenditures and investments in operating segments. Free cash flow is 
not defined under the International Financial Reporting Standards &#8211; IFRS 
and should not be considered in isolation or as a substitute for cash and cash 
equivalents calculated in accordance with IFRS. It may not be comparable to free
cash flow of other companies, however management believes that it is an 
appropriate supplemental measure that helps investors assess our liquidity and 
supports leverage management.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; 
PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt" vAlign=top width="49%">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 6pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 4pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">LPG &#8211; </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Liquified crude oil gas.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">LNG</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> &#8211; Liquified natural gas.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Operating indicators &#8211; </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">indicators used for businesses 
management and</FONT><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">are not reviewed by independent auditor. 
</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">NGL &#8211; </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Natural gas liquids.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Lifting Cost -</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> Crude oil and natural gas lifting cost 
indicator.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">LTM Adjusted EBITDA </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">&#8211; sum of the last 12 months (Last Twelve 
Months) of Adjusted EBITDA.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Basic and diluted earnings (losses) per share - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-
US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">calculated based on 
the weighted average number of shares.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Operating margin</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> - calculated based on operating income (loss) 
excluding write-offs of overpayments incorrectly capitalized.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Adjusted EBITDA margin -</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> equals Adjusted EBITDA divided by sales 
revenues. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Market share - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Relation between Distribution sales and total 
market.</FONT><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"> </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Beginning in 2015, our market share excludes 
sales made to wholesalers. Market share for prior periods was revised pursuant 
to the changes made </FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face=arial,sans-serif>&#8203;&#8203;</FONT><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 
8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">by the Brazilian National Petroleum, 
Natural Gas and Biofuels Agency (ANP) and by the Brazilian Wholesalers and Fuel 
Traders Syndicate (Sindicom). Prior periods are presented based on the new 
methodology.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Total liabilities net </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">&#8211; Total liability less</FONT><B><FONT 
lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> 
</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">adjusted cash and cash equivalents.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">PLD (differences settlement price)</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> - Electricity price in 
the spot market. Weekly weighed prices per output level (light, medium and 
heavy), number of hours and related market capacity.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Domestic crude oil sales price - </FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Average between the prices of 
exports and the internal transfer prices from Exploration &amp; Production to 
Refining, Transportation and Marketing.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Domestic natural gas production</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif"> - Natural gas production in Brazil 
less LNG plus gas reinjection.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="Petrobras Sans,sans-
serif">Jet fuel &#8211;</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" 
face="Petrobras Sans,sans-serif">Aviation fuel.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">Net Income by Business Segment-</FONT></B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-
SIZE: 8pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-serif"> Company&#8217;s segment results. 
Petrobras is an integrated energy company and most of the crude oil and natural 
gas production from the Exploration &amp; Production segment is transferred to 
other business segments of the Company. Our results by business segment include 
transactions carried out with third parties, transactions between companies of 
Petrobras&#8217;s Group and transfers between Petrobras&#8217;s business 
segments that are calculated using internal prices defined through methodologies
based on market parameters. On April 28, 2016, the Extraordinary General Meeting
approved the statutory adjustments according to the new organizational structure
of the company and its new management and governance model, to align the 
organization to the new reality of the oil and gas sector and prioritize 
profitability and capital discipline. The new management model does not provide 
for the discontinuance of the Company's business, but involves unification 
activities.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt" face="petrobras sans,sans-
serif">On June 30, 2016, the presentation related to the business segment 
information reflects the top management assessment related to the performance 
and the business resources allocation. Due to the adjustments occurred in 
corporate structure and governance and management model, this presentation may 
be reevaluated in order to enhance the business management analysis.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 10pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 115%"><FONT lang=EN-US 
style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" face=Calibri,sans-
serif></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; LINE-HEIGHT: 
normal"><B><FONT lang=EN-US style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt" color=black face="Petrobras 
Sans,sans-serif"></FONT></B>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV><FONT lang=PT-BR><BR clear=all></FONT></DIV></DIV>

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><FONT style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt" 
face=Calibri>30</FONT></P>

<DIV align=center><FONT color=#000000 size=3 face=Arial><B>FORWARD-LOOKING 
STATEMENTS </B></FONT></DIV>
<P>This press release may contain forward-looking statements within the meaning 
of Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (Securities Act), and 
Section 21E of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (Exchange Act) 
that are not based on historical facts and are not assurances of future 
results.&nbsp; These forward-looking statements are based on management's 
current view and estimates of future economic circumstances, industry 
conditions, company performance and financial results. The words "anticipates", 
"believes", "estimates", "expects", "plans" and similar expressions, as they 
relate to the company, are intended to identify forward-looking statements. 
Statements regarding the declaration or payment of dividends, the implementation
of principal operating and financing strategies and capital expenditure plans, 
the direction of future operations and the factors or trends affecting financial
condition, liquidity or results o f operations are examples of forward-looking 
statements. Such statements reflect the current views of management and are 
subject to a number of risks and uncertainties. There is no guarantee that the 
expected events, trends or results will actually occur. The statements are based
on many assumptions and factors, including general economic and market 
conditions, industry conditions, and operating factors. Any changes in such 
assumptions or factors could cause actual results to differ materially from 
current expectations.&nbsp; <BR>All forward-looking statements are expressly 
qualified in their entirety by this cautionary statement, and you should not 
place reliance on any forward-looking statement contained in this press release.
We undertake no obligation to publicly update or revise any forward-looking 
statements, whether as a result of new information or future events or for any 
other reason.</P>
